About Me

Hi! My name is Jamie and I am a Computer Science major at the University of Notre Dame. I love this field of study because it is a combination of engineering, science, and art. I'm a creative problem solver, so coding has always been an interesting and exciting skill for me.

Also, I am a member of the Band of the Fighting Irish. I am fortunate enough to march on the field for every Notre Dame home football game, and play with the band on many other occasions.
